metadata.title: CVE-2021-47526 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: serial:liteuart: Fix NULL pointer dereference in ->remove() drvdata has to be setin _probe() - otherwise platform_get_drvdata() causes null pointerdereference BUG in _remove().
